info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:48PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Delta County through 415 PM MDT... At 348 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delta, or 22 miles northwest of Montrose, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delta around 400 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Orchard City. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 63 and 76. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 5. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
